basics.name: Devon Connor
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Masters student at Loughborough University in Cyber Security and Data Analytics. Passionate about

Employment.name: Global Cyber Alliance
Employment.summary: Developed honeypot solutions in Go. Curated dynamic initialization scripts to save clients hours, allowing for the simple deployment of honeypot clusters. Produced a Pub/Sub server for handling data movement to Kafka.

Employment.name: Darktrace, Cambridge & London
Employment.summary: Gained an in-depth understanding of AI applications in network security, anomaly detection and threat prioritisation. Led a purple team project through which I devloped a novel data-extraction method allowing for information to be extracted without network traffic.

education.area: Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Chemistry, Computer Science

interests.name: Capture The Flag (CTF) Events
interests.summary: 5+ years of CTF exeprience - Worked both solo and in a team to secure 1st place in numerous events. As a part of the Warwick CTF Team secured 1st place in PwnEd and top UK team in HTBxUNI CTF.

interests.name: Hack The Box
interests.summary: Intermittently clearing HTB boxes, developing my pentesting skills

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
